{{Infobox Berry |name = #30 Nomel |image = [[File:Nomel.png]] |caption = This Berry is quite sour overall, with the sourness especially concentrated at the pointed end. |growtime = 4h 12m 0s |harvest = 29 berries |replant = 10% |points = 850 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *20 sour }} '''Nomel''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pinap]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 20 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 26 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 55 mins || 4 hours 12 mins - 8 hours 24 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NomelTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Nomel berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || || || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || || || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |} {{Berries}}
